mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bid (bid_num, product_name, user_email, price) VALUES (null, #{product_name}, #{user_email}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bid WHERE price IN ( SELECT MAX(price) FROM bid UNION ALL SELECT price FROM ( SELECT price FROM bid ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1 ) AS subquery UNION ALL SELECT MIN(price) FROM bid )
SELECT * FROM bid WHERE product_name = #{productName} ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT * FROM bid WHERE product_name = #{productName} AND user_email = #{userEmail};
